item.title: What Is Above The Fold Content? | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites
item.description: (function() {var scrollyt=window.requestAnimationFrame||function(callback){window.setTimeout(callback,1000/60)};var elementsToShowy=document.querySelectorAll('#a9hj0Hel4Nhc');function isElementInViewporty(el){if(typeof jQuery==="function"&&el instanceof jQuery){el=el[0]}var rect=el.getBoundingClientRect();return((rect.top=0)||(rect.bottom=(window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight)&&rect.top=0&&rect.bottom Above The Fold When you first navigate to a website the content you see on the screen is called above the fold content. On any device, loading above the fold content first, and the rest of the content later, will speed up the rendering of the website by the browser.

item.title: Website Images | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites, and minimize how much it costs to develop a website over the span of your five year business plan.
item.description: (function() {var scrollyt=window.requestAnimationFrame||function(callback){window.setTimeout(callback,1000/60)};var elementsToShowy=document.querySelectorAll('#aW9bEZ0SRZDo');function isElementInViewporty(el){if(typeof jQuery==="function"&&el instanceof jQuery){el=el[0]}var rect=el.getBoundingClientRect();return((rect.top=0)||(rect.bottom=(window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight)&&rect.top=0&&rect.bottom The Importance of Website Images While videos drive more social media engagement than images, images remain one of the most important aspect of website design and optimization. Images play a key role in creating attraction and conveying brand identity. As a current or future website owner, it's important to carefully consider the images selected for your website.

item.description: It’s great to have your business in a place where customers can find you with a glance. Give us a call to help out with, oh any websites you’ve ever dreamed of!

item.title: Refactoring | Build Hello Business | That's 'refactoring of code,' which is to say modernizing and simplifying any...how can we say this politely...'cryptography' you've been saddled with into a modern top tier code base.
item.description: Refactoring your code base is more than proactive troubleshooting, it’s SEO, security, and better functionality all in one. Stay ahead of the crowd, refactor that code base!
